metadata.name: Amrapali - The Courtesan
metadata.description:
Amrapali grew up to be a lady of extraordinary charm & grace and was talented in many art forms.  
She was the most desired amongst all the courtesans, proficient & highly skilled in both her music and her dance moves.

Amrapali was the entertainer of the royal court & nobility, and only the wealthy & elite could afford to attend her concerts.  
Her body, her mind, her eyes, her dance & her mesmerizing moves were unreal & hypnotic.

This artwork is a combination of acrylic & watercolor paints, print making & hand-drawn digital art.
